mapper.insert: insert into story values( seq_story_idx.nextval, #{m_idx}, #{s_content}, #{s_filename}, sysdate, sysdate+1, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select * from story_story_is_liked_join_view where s_idx=#{s_idx} and m_idx=#{m_idx}
SELECT count(*) FROM STORY_ISLIKED where s_idx=#{s_idx} and m_idx=#{m_idx}

SELECT s.S_IDX,s.S_CONTENT,s.S_FILENAME,s.S_POSTED_DATE,s.S_EXPECTED_EXPIRATION_TIME, nvl(sl.M_IDX,#{m_idx}) M_IDX, nvl(sl.SL_ISLIKED,0) SL_ISLIKED , s.s_read_hit,s.s_like_count FROM story s LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM STORY_ISLIKED WHERE m_idx=#{m_idx}) sl ON (s.s_IDX =sl.s_IDX)
mapper.delete: DELETE STORY_ISLIKED WHERE s_idx=#{s_idx} AND m_idx=#{m_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE story SET S_LIKE_COUNT = (SELECT count(*) FROM STORY_ISLIKED WHERE s_idx=#{s_idx}) WHERE s_idx=#{s_idx};
